A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve been reading a lot of negative reviews about this movie. Although it’s to be expected since people find change hard\, and this is definitely a deviation from other Star Wars movies. But it is amazing. It’s a fun\, suspenseful\, and just an amazingly well done movie. Though many of the choices in it were unexpected\, they were awesome. People are probably just salty because all their theories about everything were wrong.
